_source.short_desc: Woliba means Work Life Balance. It gives your team the power to create a culture of recognition and wellbeing that goes beyond 9 - 5.
_source.long_desc:
With Woliba organizations have a mobile friendly wellness, engagement, and recognition program with automated communication and real-time data and analytics. We help organizations consolidate multiple systems that are usually soiled into ONE comprehensive platform. 

The results include reduced time and cost with managing AND a better employee experience. 

Connect with a Woliba representative to see how we could support your organization and become an extension of your team!
_source.pricing_details:
Woliba is offered across four pricing plans (Starter, Core, Premium, Enterprise). A 30-day free trial is also available. Pricing starts at [$4/user/month] and scales with each tier, outlined below:

Starter
$4 per month, per enrolled user, billed annually
Core
$6 per month, per enrolled user, billed annually
Premium
$8 per month, per enrolled user, billed annually
Enterprise
Contact Woliba for pricing details.
_source.target_audience: Innovative companies starting their culture shift from scratch or those yet to see the participation, data, or ROI from their current wellness, engagement, and recognition programs

category_features.name: Employee Portal
category_features.definition: Online gateway through which employees can access and track their own information and metrics

category_features.name: Gamification
category_features.definition: Games or game-like elements to track progress and reward accomplishments

related_products.short_desc: Quickly create and manage multiple wellness programs all on one dashboard, and let employees earn rewards based on participation.
related_products.features: Awardco is the only employee incentive and engagement platform to partner with Amazon Business and provide millions of options for employee rewards. Enhance your organization's wellness programs by using Awardco to manage all your initiatives from one central dashboard, and let employees earn their own rewards through program participation. Easy setup, easy management, and the power of Amazon at your fingertips for all your wellness programs.

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
related_products.features: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.

related_products.short_desc: Sprout is a holistic wellbeing platform that enables and promotes a healthy and balanced workplace ecosystem.
related_products.features: The Sprout Solution is a comprehensive health and wellness platform that provides an integrated platform for access to holistic health information, health risk surveys, personalized recommendations, social networks, challenges, groups and more. Sprout helps increase awareness of health issues as well as the benefits of healthy habits and keeps employees engaged in these behaviours long term.

related_products.short_desc: Nectar's employee recognition and wellness platform makes it easy to inspire healthy behaviors both physically and emotionally.
related_products.features: Rallying the troops around wellbeing or personal development initiatives used to be a burdensome process. Nectar makes it easy to promote and incentivize your wellness initiatives. Create challenges and automatically reward your people for participating with gift cards or your own branded company swag. No contracts and No implementation fees.

related_products.short_desc: The all-in-one corporate wellness solution that boosts employee wellness and productivity.
related_products.features:
Virtuagym is the all-in-one corporate wellness solution that boosts employee wellness and productivity. 

A corporate health program will improve employee health and decrease absenteeism. By using the nutrition software, a balanced diet can be created that will have a positive influence on your employees' bodies and minds, which in turn will result in increased productivity.

Do you want to have healthier and happier employees? Book your free demo!

related_products.short_desc: Exercise.com makes it easy to manage your entire fitness business in one place.
related_products.features: Exercise.com is a fitness business software platform that's perfectly suited to deliver corporate wellness programs. Conduct digital health and nutrition assessments, deliver workouts online or in-person to individuals/groups, and track employee health and fitness habits. Additionally, the Exercise.com software platform allows you to manage members, track visits, process payments, and view powerful business reports on your dashboard. Perfect for corporations, senior centers, or municipalities.

related_products.short_desc: The no-code, interactive decision tree platform that helps users simplify complex processes and guides them to the next best action.
related_products.features: Zingtree allows you to build no-code, interactive decision trees that help you create agent scripts, guide customers, and manage internal processes. By turning your workflows into a choose-your-own-adventure-type experience, you help your users reach the next best action and make the complex simple. And because its a no-code solution, business users can create, deploy, and manage their decision trees with little-to-no IT work.

related_products.short_desc: Suite of human capital management applications: HR, benefits, payroll, performance and talent management.
related_products.features:
Natively built for the cloud, Oracle Fusion Cloud Human Capital Management is a complete solution connecting every human resource process from hire to retire. This provides a consistent experience across devices, enables one source of truth for HR data to improve decision-making, and empowers you with market-leading innovation to address your needs today and into the future.

Suite of human capital management applications includes: HR, benefits, payroll, performance and talent management.

related_products.short_desc: Wellable operates next-generation wellness challenges and health content technology platforms.
related_products.features: Wellable operates next-generation wellness challenges and health content technology platforms and complements these solutions with on-site services, such as fitness classes, seminars, health coaching, and more. The technology's flexibility allows organizations to customize and configure a program to meet their needs and objectives while providing a rich experience for end-users. Wellable works with employers and health plans of all sizes across the world.

related_products.short_desc: Partner with Blueboard to offer employee wellbeing gifts that inspire adventure, activity and much-needed quality time with loved ones.
related_products.features: Recognize your employees' achievements with gifts that support their wellbeing. Blueboard experiences are designed to rejuvenate, reconnect and inspire. Imagine offering your employees their choice of a kayaking trip for two, a pottery class, a month at their favorite yoga studio, or a VIP museum experience with the family. At the end of the day, we're all craving adventure, and with our global menu of hand-curated experiences, there's truly something for everyone.

similar_products.short_desc: Wellics is a corporate wellness software that enables businesses to inspire, motivate, educate, and reward employees.
similar_products.features: Wellics helps employers inspire and educate employees with modules based on short videos by experts and other resources. It motivates people by allowing them to set their personal goals and see the results of their efforts. The organization can identify top performers and wellness champions and reward achievement, consistency, or both. The admins can use Wellics Index and standard or custom metrics to monitor how their program contributes to the company-wide goals and prove its ROI.

similar_products.short_desc: Engagement-centric employee wellness, delivered through a secure mobile app, with powerful automation and visualizations for your team.
similar_products.features:
LifeOmic Precision Wellness is an engagement-first, mobile app-powered employee wellness program. 

The robust organization health program includes workout videos, habit tracking, incentive disbursement, wellness subsidies, challenges, daily to-dos, health content, wearables integrations, Slack/Teams integration, automated administration, engagement tracking, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Wellable operates next-generation wellness challenges and health content technology platforms.
similar_products.features: Wellable operates next-generation wellness challenges and health content technology platforms and complements these solutions with on-site services, such as fitness classes, seminars, health coaching, and more. The technology's flexibility allows organizations to customize and configure a program to meet their needs and objectives while providing a rich experience for end-users. Wellable works with employers and health plans of all sizes across the world.

similar_products.short_desc: COVID-19 Daily Symptoms Check Platform for Workplaces, which employees can download as a mobile app.
similar_products.features: COVID-19 Daily Symptoms Check Platform for Workplaces, which employees can download as a mobile app.

similar_products.short_desc: Burnalong is a holistic health, wellness, and fitness platform offering 13,000+ online classes spanning 45+ wellness categories.
similar_products.features:
Burnalong is a holistic health, wellness, and fitness platform focused on bringing employees, and their families, choice, social motivation, and personalization in their online wellness journey. 

With an expansive library of 13,000+ live and on-demand classes spanning 45+ wellness categories taught by 2,000+ diverse instructors, BurnAlong ensures each employee receives personalized content suggestions through machine learning, tailored to fit their unique wellness goals.

similar_products.short_desc: Corporate wellness platform with optimized solutions that aim to help organizations promote a healthy and better-engaged workplace.
similar_products.features:
Wellness360 is a software-as-a-service (SaaS) wellness technology platform. It provides comprehensive employee wellness program to Healthcare Providers, Payers, Benefits Brokers, Wellness Companies, and Employers.

Our mission is to provide the right tools to change employee habits, improve their health & wellbeing, and reduce the risk of chronic diseases. Wellness360 optimizes wellness initiatives that offer tailor-made wellness solutions with HRA, coaching, personal & team challenges, and more

similar_products.short_desc: Virgin Pulse delivers health, wellbeing and navigation solutions on a world class engagement platform, powered by smart technology.
similar_products.features: Virgin Pulse's diverse technology and live solutions span all stages of health, wellbeing and navigation, and are designed to grow with you. Featuring the industry's only Homebase for Health? that unifies and simplifies the health journey, Virgin Pulse fuses high-tech and high-touch to support the entire health, wellbeing and benefits lifecycle. We drive health outcomes and reduce healthcare costs, helping you build competitive advantage and achieve results that matter.

similar_products.short_desc: A holistic and science-based wellbeing platform to manage and improve mental resilience, self-leadership and employee performance.
similar_products.features:
Empower and engage employees with a mobile first mental well-being & performance coach, available 24/7. Our holistic approach to wellbeing helps build a resilient workforce, reduce stress and improve results.  

Organizational and individual health check-ins, interactive coaching with actionable tools and resources to balance life on and off work, make it easy to scale, adapt and follow up company-wide wellness initiatives with the individual in mind.

similar_products.short_desc: Quickly create and manage multiple wellness programs all on one dashboard, and let employees earn rewards based on participation.
similar_products.features: Awardco is the only employee incentive and engagement platform to partner with Amazon Business and provide millions of options for employee rewards. Enhance your organization's wellness programs by using Awardco to manage all your initiatives from one central dashboard, and let employees earn their own rewards through program participation. Easy setup, easy management, and the power of Amazon at your fingertips for all your wellness programs.

similar_products.short_desc: Questis transforms businesses by helping employees solve the root causes of financial stress with technology and one-on-one coaching.
similar_products.features: Questis is a workforce financial empowerment company providing a complete personal finance solution that benefits people and employers. We help businesses become life-changing employers by helping employees solve the root causes of financial stress. Our innovative solution meets people at the paycheck with solid behavioral science, personalized, predictive planning, real-person coaching, and a modern, friendly user experience. Learn more at questis.co.

similar_products.short_desc: CoreHealth's advanced wellness platform and suite of solutions empower employers and wellness providers' total well-being programs.
similar_products.features: Since 2004, CoreHealth has and continues to bring together the science of prevention, the art of engagement, and the power of technology in new and inspiring ways to help people find their own path to wellness. With robust data analysis to drive informed decisions and gamified software to engage participants in their health journeys, employers and wellness providers can deliver targeted programs and measure their impact. CoreHealth's teechnology powers over 3.5 million participant journeys

similar_products.short_desc: MoveSpring is a fun, easy-to-use activity and step challenge platform for companies.
similar_products.features: MoveSpring is a fun, easy-to-use activity and step challenge platform for companies.  Connect a wearable device or smartphone to track your activity, which syncs in real time to our native iOS, Android and web app. With nine challenge modes, customizable content, friends and chat, creating a successful wellness program has never been easier. Quickly create challenges, run reports and track your group's progress over time in our intuitive Admin Center.

similar_products.short_desc: Sprout is a holistic wellbeing platform that enables and promotes a healthy and balanced workplace ecosystem.
similar_products.features: The Sprout Solution is a comprehensive health and wellness platform that provides an integrated platform for access to holistic health information, health risk surveys, personalized recommendations, social networks, challenges, groups and more. Sprout helps increase awareness of health issues as well as the benefits of healthy habits and keeps employees engaged in these behaviours long term.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Benefits Administration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Benefits Administration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Benefits Administration software helps HR professionals organize employee information for medical, dental, 401K, disability and retirement benefits. This software helps ensure compliance with benefit eligibility and COBRA standards, and tracks benefit spending for companies in nearly any industry. These solutions also include benefit statement software and benefit plan software. Benefits Administration software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, and Workforce Management software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Engagement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Engagement software aims to assist managers with maintaining employee awareness of corporate culture and increasing their level of investment in the company. Employee surveys, gamification tools, team sentiment analytics, and applications that streamline communication are all represented.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

category_features.name: Peer-to-Peer Recognition
category_features.definition: Allows employees to praise one another in a social network-like feed visible to the whole organization.

category_features.name: Recognition Tracking
category_features.definition: Track accrued recognition and rewards at an individual employee level

category_features.name: Activity/News Feed
category_features.definition: Continuous profile-based stream of news and activity

category_features.name: Blogs
category_features.definition: Allows users to publish blogs on social site

category_features.name: Calendar Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share multiple calendars

category_features.name: Content Management
category_features.definition: Creating, updating, monitoring accuracy, and ensuring brand consistency for all written materials that are distributed to stakeholders.

category_features.name: Discussions / Forums
category_features.definition: Online forums/groups where users can ask questions, share ideas, best practices, etc.

category_features.name: Knowledge Base Management
category_features.definition: Create, store and share information, data, and support articles in a centralized database

category_features.name: Policy Management
category_features.definition: A set of guidelines regarding different business scenarios

category_features.name: Search/Filter
category_features.definition: Search available resources to locate required information

category_features.name: Wiki
category_features.definition: An informational database that allows users to add, delete, or revise content

related_products.short_desc: The only employee recognition and engagement platform that integrates with Amazon to provide rewarding, simple, flexible recognition.
related_products.features: Everything you love about Amazon is now available for rewards, recognition, and incentives. Awardco has partnered with Amazon Business to bring millions of reward choices, lower vendor fees and dollar-for-dollar recognition spend to your organization. More choice, more capability, and less spend - all in one simple platform. Minimum company size of 100 employees.

related_products.short_desc: Bonusly is the recognition, engagement, and rewards platform employees love. It practically runs itself, so you'll love it, too.
related_products.features: Bonusly is the fun and easy way to recognize all of your employees. Designed for both users and admins, Bonusly features peer-to-peer recognition that's connected to company values, automated celebrations for new hires, birthdays, and work anniversaries, customizable awards, flexible survey tools, and an international reward catalog with gift card, donation, and swag options. 87% of Bonusly users participate in the program every month, generating actionable people analytics you can trust.

related_products.short_desc: Guusto helps HR Leaders at companies with 200+ employees to recognize great work and shape amazing culture. #1 HIGHEST RATED ON G2!
related_products.features:
Guusto helps HR Leaders at companies with 200+ employees to recognize great work and shape amazing culture.

#1 HIGHEST RATED on Capterra & G2!  

NO POINTS that lack transparency, value and impact. No minimums, markups or hidden fees, and full credit back on unclaimed rewards. 

FLEXIBLE REDEMPTION so people choose something they actually want.

PURPOSE-DRIVEN with one day of clean water donated for every gift sent.

FREE ACCOUNT to get started sending rewards in minutes, not months!

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee recognition platform where employees can recognize each other, add a dollar, and cash out for rewards.
related_products.features: We are changing the game of employee recognition! With adding our new ThanksMattters Card to our platform, we'll have your employees carrying around company gratitude in their pocket. With that, we are a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. #thanksmatters

related_products.short_desc: Kudos? partners mid-sized and enterprise clients worldwide across all industries.
related_products.features: Kudos? is an employee engagement, culture, and analytics platform, that harnesses the power of peer-to-peer recognition, values reinforcement, and open communication to help organizations boost employee engagement, reduce turnover, improve culture, and drive productivity and performance.

related_products.short_desc: Create group cards perfect for employee birthdays, work anniversaries, and other special occasions.  Popular with remote teams!
related_products.features:
Use Kudoboard's group cards for workplace appreciation on special occasions, shout outs, and company events. Perfect to celebrate staff birthdays, work anniversaries, onboarding, farewells, retirement, and more. 

Using the product is easy - simply create a board, add content including messages, pictures, videos, and GIFs, and then invite others to sign.

related_products.short_desc: WebHR is everyone's favorite and a global leader in Cloud HR - Helps you manage the most important asset in your company - your People!
related_products.features: WebHR is revolutionizing the way HR works. WebHR is a Social all-in-one Cloud based HR Software for Small & Medium Enterprises that handles everything from Hire to Retire, in the most innovate way. WebHR not only saves money to the companies, but also boosts productivity, saves space and make inter and intra-office communications fast, reliable and more efficient. WebHR assists in managing a companys most important asset - its People.

related_products.short_desc: Nectar is a people platform that bundles social recognition, rewards & swag management to promote core values & improve culture.
related_products.features: Nectar helps you create a culture people won't want to leave through consistent, meaningful peer-to-peer recognition & rewards. Build a sense of community, evangelize core values and connect people to each other and the mission of your company. 94% of our customers have seen an increase in employee engagement. Break down the barriers of remote work, boost morale and help people feel valued for their contribution everyday. No implementation fees or long contracts (month to month).

related_products.short_desc: Tango Card bundles simple technology, great rewards, and expert service to help companies get the most out of their reward programs.
related_products.features: Tango Card provides leading incentive-delivery technology to organizations in the B2B space. Globally, enterprise companies use this technology to deliver an extensive catalog of domestic and global e-gift cards as part of consumer loyalty programs, sales incentive programs, health and wellness engagement, and employee recognition. Tango Card believes instantly delivering the most desirable rewards maximizes impact and drives real business results.

related_products.short_desc: Fond is a global SaaS platform that seamlessly consolidates employee rewards and recognition processes into one easy-to-use solution.
related_products.features:
Fond is a global SaaS platform that seamlessly consolidates employee rewards and recognition processes into one easy-to-use solution. With Fond, employees and managers can recognize each other, redeem rewards, access exclusive corporate discounts, and measure success so HR departments spend less time managing programs and more time driving results. 

Fond is headquartered in San Francisco, California.

related_products.short_desc: It's never been easier to make your team feel appreciated and stay connected!
related_products.features:
Do you want to lead a passionate team that feels empowered by their work? 

To experience a sense of camaraderie with their co-workers and the company as a whole? Then Spinify is perfect for you! We make it easy for managers to recognize their staff and take steps to establish a positive culture. Using gamification, competitions, notifications, and more - Spinify makes it simple for companies to maintain an engaging workplace culture, where everyone feels valued!

Our Client Success Team partners with you to create fully branded solutions aligned to your employee engagement goals, and to reflect your unique mission, culture and employer brand to drive the highest levels of platform usage.

similar_products.short_desc: Bucketlist Rewards is a leading employee recognition tool where employees earn points for high performance that they can redeem later t
similar_products.features: Bucketlist is an employee recognition, rewards, and incentive program that employees love to use. Bucketlist personalizes recognition to match the individual needs of the employee. With Bucketlist employees can earn points and redeem them to achieve life goals. Bucketlist is a powerful tool that results in higher employee engagement and lower voluntary turnover and is perfect for mid to large size companies (100 - 5,000 employees). Learn more at bucketlistrewards.com and schedule a demo now!

similar_products.short_desc: Kazoo combines Goals & OKRs, Recognition, Feedback, Conversations, and Incentives within a single, easy-to-use platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Welcome to the most complete collection of employee recognition tools for celebrating daily wins and team triumphs for large companies.
similar_products.features:
Crafted specifically for large-scale employee recognition programs, and ideal for enterprise and global workforces. Give and receive recognition with Culture Cloud. Culture Cloud Recognition helps every employee appreciate great work to make playing on a winning team a way of life.

From career milestones to everyday expressions of gratitude, Culture Cloud Recognition offers enterprise clients the widest variety of tools for crafting diverse employee experiences that engage and inspire.

similar_products.short_desc: Peer award and recognition software for teams.
similar_products.features: Accolader is a free peer award system. It focuses on awards, not rewards. Accolader is built on what works to increase happiness and engagement, rather than rewards, which don't. A focus has been placed on simplicity, in both administration and usage.

similar_products.short_desc: Employee recognition software designed specifically to automate the distribution of digital gift cards to employees at scale.
similar_products.features: WeGift allows companies to recognize employees by easily distributing digital gift cards to employees at scale. With the WeGift API, you can connect directly to the world's largest network of digital incentives. Save money on your customer loyalty programs by accessing industry-leading discounts on gift cards. Choose gift cards from major brands in any currency. View real-time data to glean insights from your reports. Easily use gift cards to make your employees feel more recognized.

Performance Management software is related to 360 Degree Feedback software, Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.
